entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Rosthern
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -10.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
